scripts.docker:dev: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up
scripts.docker:dev:build: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build
scripts.docker:dev:detach: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.docker:stop: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml stop
scripts.docker:down: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down
scripts.docker:down:volumes: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v
scripts.docker:restart: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml restart
scripts.docker:restart:web: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml restart web
scripts.docker:restart:db: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml restart db
scripts.docker:logs: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f
scripts.docker:logs:web: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f web
scripts.docker:logs:db: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f db
scripts.docker:ps: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps
scripts.docker:shell:web: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web sh
scripts.docker:shell:db: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec db sh
scripts.docker:db:migrate: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web pnpm --filter web db:run-migrations
scripts.docker:db:generate: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web pnpm --filter web db:generate
scripts.docker:db:status: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web pnpm --filter web db:status
scripts.docker:db:check: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web pnpm --filter web db:check
scripts.docker:db:baseline: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web pnpm --filter web db:baseline
scripts.docker:db:repair: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web pnpm --filter web db:repair
scripts.docker:db:push: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web pnpm --filter web db:push
scripts.docker:db:studio: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web pnpm --filter web db:studio
scripts.docker:db:seed: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web pnpm --filter web db:seed
scripts.docker:db:seed-rbac: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web pnpm --filter web db:seed-rbac
scripts.docker:db:psql: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec db psql -U idaraos -d idaraos
scripts.docker:db:reset: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.docker:rebuild:web: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build --force-recreate web
scripts.docker:rebuild:all: cd deployment/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build --force-recreate
